content: After resting at the Shrine, you’ll have two paths - one leading into a darkened area on the left, and the brighter path along the cliffs to the right with a narrow ravine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Squall Hideout' and the sub-subsection 'The First Buddha’s Eyeball'.
The content is as follows:
After resting at the Shrine, you’ll have two paths - one leading into a darkened area on the left, and the brighter path along the cliffs to the right with a narrow ravine.
